channel.title: Hey i need to know what to change in my source and client =]-Plz Reply-
channel.description: Hey i need help.Basically i need you to tell me what to edit and change in my source and client for it to be mine and when i open run it say my server name is online.Plz reply and tell me what to change. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- P.S.............Can you tell me what to put in my compiler and in my run box? Also do when i change the server name in the run thingy do i out (myservername) or (myservername).no-ip.biz? -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- THANK YOU!

item.source: Hey i need to know what to change in my source and client =]-Plz Reply-

item.title: Hey i need to know what to change in my source and client =]-Plz Reply-
item.dc:creator: @Deathman17 Deathman17
item.description:
@Deathman17 wrote:

ok first thing you gotta do for the cmd window just right click and edit run_client.bat…in there it will say the server name of the client just change it…yours might not but mine did…for mostly everything else its located in mudclient.java just use ctrl + f and search for the name of the one thats already there…and edit it to yours…then in playerlogin.java somewhere in there is a welcome to “servername” for when you log in…just change that to your server name 2…for backgrounds edit the loading.rscd located in the data folder…you will need either winrar or zzip to view the pic

Read full topic

THANK YOU!
